question: Jason places almonds on some baskets. Each basket can hold 22 almonds. If he has 326 almonds and 10 baskets, how many almonds won't he be able to place on the basket?
answer:
Jason will be able to place a total of 22*10 = <<22*10=220>>220 almonds.
Therefore, there are 326 - 220 = <<326-220=106>>106 almonds that he won't be able to place on the basket.
#### 106
